WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr.Rogue is now included in the releases, so I've created a discussion topic instead of this issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Attached is the Rawr.Rogue model that is under development. To use it, copy the attached Rawr.Rogue.dll into your Rawr\Data directory, in (the same place where Rawr.Bear.dll is located)
 
Recent Updates:
- basic Envenom model (Rev 0)
- HAT
- Fixed Bug in Relentless Strikes
- Poison Normalized PPM
- Hemo's Per Cycle to HAT
- Glyphs: Eviscerate, Mutilate, Hunger for Blood, Sinister Strike
- added gemming templates, which also fixes bug where items would not show up in the list
 
Not modeled yet:
- SnD uptime (currently modeled at 100%)
- riposte
- ghostly strike
- Killing Spree
- Savage Combat
- Anesthetic Poison
- Glyph of Backstab
- Glyph of Killing Spree
- Glyph of Vigor
- Glyph of Fan of Knives
- Glyph of Expose Armor
- Glyph of Slice and Dice
- Glyph of Feint
- Glyph of Ghostly Strike
- Glyph of Rupture
- Glyph of Blade Flurry
- Glyph of Adrenaline Rush
If you find any bugs or have any feature requests, please either respond to this topic, or create a new issue. 
 
Feedback and suggestions are welcome!

Comments.Message:

- added gemming templates, which also fixes bug where items would not show up in the list
- updated DLL
Thanks a lot for updating this so quickly :)
Forgot to include Rawr.Base.dll which contains the Rogue Glyphs

REMOVED DLL
- latest version depends on some other updated DLLs, so installing Rawr.Rogue breaks Rawr.  I'll get this updated ASAP
latest Rawr.Rogue included with 2.2.5, so I'll update the dll again when I have another set of changes.
